title: How To Do A Pantry Challenge | Shelf Cooking 101
itunes:title: How To Do A Pantry Challenge | Shelf Cooking 101
description:
One key way we can save money on food and see a reduction in our grocery bill (at least for a time!) is through a pantry challenge. Join us as we talk more about using up the food and ingredients we already have on hand to cut food costs and change the way we grocery shop long term.

Get full show notes here!

  • Get our FREE 7-Day No-Spend Challenge Workbook here! https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/free 
  • Join the waitlist for Club BFF: https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/club-bff-waitlist/ 
  • Subscribe for more on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/frugalfriends 
  • Hang out with us on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/frugalfriendspodcast/ 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
